DomainProvision.name: DomainProvision
DomainProvision.description: Represents provisioned changes to custom domains.

CnameTarget.description: Represents the canonical name (CNAME) of the external host or server for this domain. If you use a non-Salesforce provider, such as your own external server or CDN provider, to serve your domain, this field points to the CNAME of the external provider.

IsActive.description: Represents whether the provisioning for this domain is processing or complete (true) or not (false). When you activate a provisioned domain, this field is set to false.

ProvisionEndDate.description: Represents when the provisioning process was finished.

ProvisionFinalizeDate.description: Represents when the provisioning process was canceled or when the provisioned domain was activated.

ProvisionStartDate.description: Represents when the provisioning process started.

TargetCdnCertificate.description: If the domain is served on the Salesforce Content Delivery Network (CDN), represents the certificate that serves this domain.

TargetDomainName.description: Represents the domain name, such as www.example.com.
